elements.description: Defines the list to load more items.
Defines an element that will be displayed while the library is loading items in the background.
Defines an element where to display the total items of the list.
Defines an element where to display the amount of items per page.
Defines an element where to scroll the view every time a page in `Pagination` mode is switched.
Defines the template element to generate all page buttons for the `Pagination` mode.
Defines the template element to create the page dots separators.

options.description: When clicking the Next button more items will be loaded and rendered at the end of the list.
When the bottom of the list reaches a certain threshold more items will be loaded and rendered at the end of the list.
Users can quickly navigate through pages.
All items will be loaded and rendered on the list. Not advised for lists with more than 200 items.

settings.description: Defines when new items will load when the user scrolls
Defines the amount of digits to display either side of the current page. It can be a comma-separated string listing the values in a `Desktop, Tablet, Landscape, Portrait` order.
Defines the amount of digits to display at the start and end of a page buttons list. It can be a comma-separated string listing the values in a `Desktop, Tablet, Landscape, Portrait` order.
Defines the animation to use when appending elements to the list.

options.description: The items will slide from the bottom.
The items will slide from the top.
The items will slide from the left to the right.
The items will slide from the right to the left.

settings.description: Defines the easing function of the animation.

options.description: The items animation curve will be linear.
The items animation curve will be ease.
The items animation curve will be ease-in.
The items animation curve will be ease-out.
The items animation curve will be ease-in-out.

settings.description: Defines the duration of the animation in miliseconds.
Defines a stagger delay for the items animation in miliseconds.
Defines if Webflow's interactions should be restarted after rendering new items. Use it if your Collection List Items use interactions.
Defines if the pagination query params should be displayed on the URL.
